import React, { useState } from "react"; import "./header.css" import {Link,BrowserRouter as Router} from 'react-router-dom'; import Modal from 'react-modal'; const customStyles = { content: { width: '20%', height: '50%', top:'11.5%', left: '70%', position:'absolute', border: '3px solid #09AA7C', }, }; Modal.setAppElement('#root'); const Header = () => { let sub; const [modalIsOpen, setIsOpen] = useState(false); function openModal() { setIsOpen(true); } function afterOpenModal() { sub.style.color = '#033A2B'; } function closeModal() { setIsOpen(false); } return (
